Strings.Text: {scroll 0}I'm sorry that you were\nworried about me.{scroll 2}{clear 75}{scroll 0}\nWe are in great danger!{scroll 2}{timed 75}
{scroll 0}\nWe must organize a search{scroll 2}{clear 45}{scroll 0}for the others, and get the\nhell outta here!{scroll 2}{timed 105}
{scroll 0}Okay, I'll go first! Proceed\nwith your own judgment.{scroll 2}{clear 135}{scroll 0}\nAlright? Can you do it?{scroll 2}{timed 60}
{scroll 0}\nYes, Sir! I will do my best!{scroll 2}{timed 95}
